div.h3: Dr. Mike Curry - Supt., 19 days ago
div.p: 🚨Governor Pritzker has extended our stay-at-home order and school closure through April 30th. More D276 information to follow this evening.

div.h3: Dr. Mike Curry - Supt., 1 day ago
div.p: Thank you to everyone who drove through tonight’s #Bethelight celebration. What an amazing community turnout in support and celebration of the Class of 2020. Thank you to Mr. Weedman for seeing this event through. We are stronger together #atownproud

To keep traffic flowing during this evenings #Bethelight celebration please enter the high school parking lot through the west gate in front of the school, go through the high school parking lot and turn right and go by the football and softball fields and exit by the bus garage.

div.h3: Dr. Mike Curry - Supt., 1 day ago
div.p: Reminder: in order to follow social distancing guidelines, there can be no congregating or parking on school grounds tonight. Please drive through and show your support for our Seniors by flashing your lights and honking your horns.
